name: Zaos
storyline:
In a war-torn land spanning multiple continents, factions vie for power as they engage in battles for ultimate supremacy.

As a lone warrior in this conflict, you must choose an allegiance and confront enemies from all sides as you strive to overcome conflict against the mightiest of challengers.

It is your time to choose between light and darkness and enforce your beliefs upon the realm.

Seize your destiny and allow your own hand to write the history that will be remembered in Zaos.
summary: International Free to Play Fantasy MMORPG game, featuring incredible journeys through a beautiful expanding world.
